Class Event<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.muspellheim.commons.util.Event<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the message type.

    public class Event<T>
extends Object
    An event send a message to handlers.

      Adds a handler to notify it of sending events.

      Removes a handler to not notify it anymore.
